full_sentence: Don't worry, love, we've chased them out before! We will do it again, bitch!

Yes Judaism is complex by nature. In 1666 they embraced "redemption through sin.". However that does not mean that they fantasized about abusive behaviour or that they migrated towards acting out these abusive fantasies. They were just looking for redemption at the behest of then "Messiah" Sabbatai Zevi.

The holocaust was just a cleansing to burn the sins away. Our fuhreh, hitler (PEACE BE UPON HIM) was doing it for self defense. If you've read his book, our holy book, then you know. Actually don't read it because any interpretation that you make that sees him in a bad light is all wrong and only my interpretations are correct even if the interpretations doesn't make sense and all the nazis that killed jews aren't "real nazis" You naziphobe.
Don't go anywhere near Acton/Southall are aunless you want to live near a construction site
